HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"What sort of idiot decided savages from north Africa, Syria, and other backward places are civilized and would fit into Europe nicely?"
"I am an autistic rights activists which is different from a human rights activists since the autistic aren't human"
"when the terrorists in a show are Muslim and you know it's because islamophobic cis white men made the show #s #m #h"
"BITCH U IN A WHEELCHAIR HAHAHAHA HOW U GONNA STAND UP FOR SOMEONE WHEN U CANT WALK @IsaJennie"
"Only a radical far right political ideology can rid White Europe of the mess we now face. It is time for White Racists to take a stand."
"Muslims are willing to flood enemy nations, kill, and terrorize to win, while Whites are only willing to vote and whine about violence."
"When women talk to each other, the devil sits in a corner, quietly listening and learning."
"Open borders? What next free coach rides for Isis to anywhere in Europe?"
"Although men are lifting the bans on gay marriage, God still has banned the practice, and, therefore, Christians are not to recognize it."
"I love my race. I don't necessarily hate all others, but they've their own places of origin. Multiculturalism's #WhiteGenocide. #WR #WN"
